text: Stephen H. Sachs (January 31, 1934 â€“ January 12, 2022) was an American Democratic politician and lawyer. He was the Attorney General of Maryland from 1979 to 1987. Sachs was born in Baltimore, Maryland. He was United States Attorney for the District of Maryland from 1967 until 1970. He was nominated by President Lyndon B. Johnson and re-nominated by Richard Nixon. Sachs died on January 12, 2022 in Baltimore at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Lawyers from Baltimore Category:Politicians from Baltimore Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Stephen H. Sachs
